00064 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_RotationMatrix {
00065 
00066 protected:
00067 
00069     EGS_Float   rxx, rxy, rxz,
00070                 ryx, ryy, ryz,
00071                 rzx, rzy, rzz;
00072 
00073 public:
00074 
00076     EGS_RotationMatrix() {
00077         rxx=1;
00078         rxy=0;
00079         rxz=0;
00080         ryx=0;
00081         ryy=1;
00082         ryz=0;
00083         rzx=0;
00084         rzy=0;
00085         rzz=1;
00086     };
00087 
00088     //
00089     // hopefully no one will use this constructor
00090     // with a non-rotation matrix elements
00091     //
00093     EGS_RotationMatrix(EGS_Float xx, EGS_Float xy, EGS_Float xz,
00094                        EGS_Float yx, EGS_Float yy, EGS_Float yz,
00095                        EGS_Float zx, EGS_Float zy, EGS_Float zz) {
00096         rxx=xx;
00097         rxy=xy;
00098         rxz=xz;
00099         ryx=yx;
00100         ryy=yy;
00101         ryz=yz;
00102         rzx=zx;
00103         rzy=zy;
00104         rzz=zz;
00105     };
00106 
00108     EGS_RotationMatrix(const EGS_RotationMatrix &m) {
00109         rxx=m.rxx;
00110         rxy=m.rxy;
00111         rxz=m.rxz;
00112         ryx=m.ryx;
00113         ryy=m.ryy;
00114         ryz=m.ryz;
00115         rzx=m.rzx;
00116         rzy=m.rzy;
00117         rzz=m.rzz;
00118     };
00119 
00127     bool isRotation() const {
00128         EGS_Float d = det() - 1;
00129         EGS_RotationMatrix t((*this)*inverse());
00130         if (fabs(d) > 1e-4 || !t.isI()) {
00131             return false;
00132         }
00133         return true;
00134     };
00135 
00136     // creates a matrix which, when applied to the vector v,
00137     // transforms it into a vector along the z-axis.
00138     // why z-axis?
00139     // well, it has to be one of the axis and in physics
00140     // things usually happen along the z-axis!
00148     EGS_RotationMatrix(const EGS_Vector &v) {
00149         EGS_Float sinz = v.x*v.x + v.y*v.y;
00150         EGS_Float norm = sinz + v.z*v.z;
00151         if (norm < 1e-15) egsFatal("EGS_RotationMatrix::EGS_RotationMatrix: \n"
00152                                        "  no construction from a zero vector possible!\n");
00153         norm = sqrt(norm);
00154         if (sinz > 1e-15) {
00155             sinz = sqrt(sinz);
00156             EGS_Float cphi = v.x/sinz;
00157             register EGS_Float sphi = v.y/sinz;
00158             EGS_Float cost = v.z/norm;
00159             register EGS_Float sint = -sinz/norm;
00160             *this = rotY(cost,sint)*rotZ(cphi,sphi);
00161         }
00162         else { // v is along the z-axis => matrix is the unit transformation
00163             rxx = 1;
00164             rxy = 0;
00165             rxz = 0;
00166             ryx = 0;
00167             ryy = 1;
00168             ryz = 0;
00169             rzx = 0;
00170             rzy = 0;
00171             rzz = 1;
00172         }
00173     };
00174 
00175     // R_x(alpha) * R_y(beta) * R_z(gamma)
00179     EGS_RotationMatrix(EGS_Float alpha, EGS_Float beta, EGS_Float gamma) {
00180         *this = rotX(alpha)*rotY(beta)*rotZ(gamma);
00181     };
00182 
00183     // R_z(phi) * R_x(theta)
00187     EGS_RotationMatrix(EGS_Float phi, EGS_Float theta) {
00188         *this = rotZ(phi)*rotX(theta);
00189     };
00190 
00192     EGS_RotationMatrix &operator=(const EGS_RotationMatrix &m) {
00193         rxx=m.rxx;
00194         rxy=m.rxy;
00195         rxz=m.rxz;
00196         ryx=m.ryx;
00197         ryy=m.ryy;
00198         ryz=m.ryz;
00199         rzx=m.rzx;
00200         rzy=m.rzy;
00201         rzz=m.rzz;
00202         return *this;
00203     };
00204 
00206     bool operator==(const EGS_RotationMatrix &m) {
00207         return
00208             ((rxx == m.rxx) && (rxy == m.rxy) && (rxz == m.rxz) &&
00209              (ryx == m.ryx) && (ryy == m.ryy) && (ryz == m.ryz) &&
00210              (rzx == m.rxz) && (rzy == m.rzy) && (rzz == m.rzz)) ? true : false;
00211     };
00212 
00215     bool isI() const {
00216         return (rxx == 1 && rxy == 0 && rxz == 0 && ryx == 0 && ryy == 1 &&
00217                 ryz == 0 && rzx == 0 && rzy == 0 && rzz == 1);
00218     };
00219 
00221     EGS_Vector operator*(const EGS_Vector &v) const {
00222         return EGS_Vector(rxx*v.x + rxy*v.y + rxz*v.z,
00223                           ryx*v.x + ryy*v.y + ryz*v.z,
00224                           rzx*v.x + rzy*v.y + rzz*v.z);
00225     };
00226 
00229     EGS_RotationMatrix operator*(const EGS_RotationMatrix &m) const {
00230         return EGS_RotationMatrix(
00231                    rxx*m.rxx+rxy*m.ryx+rxz*m.rzx, rxx*m.rxy+rxy*m.ryy+rxz*m.rzy,
00232                    rxx*m.rxz+rxy*m.ryz+rxz*m.rzz,
00233                    ryx*m.rxx+ryy*m.ryx+ryz*m.rzx, ryx*m.rxy+ryy*m.ryy+ryz*m.rzy,
00234                    ryx*m.rxz+ryy*m.ryz+ryz*m.rzz,
00235                    rzx*m.rxx+rzy*m.ryx+rzz*m.rzx, rzx*m.rxy+rzy*m.ryy+rzz*m.rzy,
00236                    rzx*m.rxz+rzy*m.ryz+rzz*m.rzz);
00237     };
00238 
00239     // r *= m means r = r*m
00243     EGS_RotationMatrix &operator*=(const EGS_RotationMatrix &m) {
00244         return *this = operator * (m);
00245     };
00246 
00247     // r.multiply(m) means r = m*r;
00255     void multiply(const EGS_RotationMatrix &m) {
00256         *this = m.operator * (*this);
00257     };
00258 
00264     EGS_RotationMatrix inverse() const {
00265         return EGS_RotationMatrix(rxx,ryx,rzx,rxy,ryy,rzy,rxz,ryz,rzz);
00266     };
00267 
00269     EGS_RotationMatrix T() {
00270         return EGS_RotationMatrix(rxx,ryx,rzx,rxy,ryy,rzy,rxz,ryz,rzz);
00271     };
00272 
00274     EGS_RotationMatrix &invert() {
00275         return *this = inverse();
00276     };
00277 
00281     static EGS_RotationMatrix rotX(EGS_Float cphi,EGS_Float sphi) {
00282         return EGS_RotationMatrix(
00283                    (EGS_Float)1,(EGS_Float)0,(EGS_Float)0,
00284                    (EGS_Float)0,        cphi,        sphi,
00285                    (EGS_Float)0,       -sphi,        cphi);
00286     };
00287 
00291     static EGS_RotationMatrix rotY(EGS_Float cphi,EGS_Float sphi) {
00292         return EGS_RotationMatrix(cphi, (EGS_Float)0,         sphi,
00293                                   (EGS_Float)0, (EGS_Float)1, (EGS_Float)0,
00294                                   -sphi, (EGS_Float)0,         cphi);
00295     };
00296 
00300     static EGS_RotationMatrix rotZ(EGS_Float cphi,EGS_Float sphi) {
00301         return EGS_RotationMatrix(cphi,        sphi, (EGS_Float)0,
00302                                   -sphi,        cphi, (EGS_Float)0,
00303                                   (EGS_Float)0,(EGS_Float)0, (EGS_Float)1);
00304     };
00305 
00307     static EGS_RotationMatrix rotX(EGS_Float phi) {
00308         return rotX(cos(phi),sin(phi));
00309     };
00310 
00312     static EGS_RotationMatrix rotY(EGS_Float phi) {
00313         return rotY(cos(phi),sin(phi));
00314     };
00315 
00317     static EGS_RotationMatrix rotZ(EGS_Float phi) {
00318         return rotZ(cos(phi),sin(phi));
00319     };
00320 
00324     static EGS_RotationMatrix rotV(EGS_Float phi, const EGS_Vector &v) {
00325         return rotV(cos(phi),sin(phi),v);
00326     };
00327 
00329     static EGS_RotationMatrix rotV(EGS_Float cphi, EGS_Float sphi,
00330                                    const EGS_Vector &v) {
00331         EGS_RotationMatrix m(v);
00332         return (m.inverse())*(rotZ(cphi,sphi))*(m);
00333     };
00334 
00336     EGS_Float det() const {
00337         return rxx*ryy*rzz + rxy*ryz*rzx + ryx*rzy*rxz -
00338                rxz*ryy*rzx - rxy*ryx*rzz - rzy*ryz*rxx;
00339     };
00340 
00344     friend EGS_Vector operator*(const EGS_Vector &v,
00345                                 const EGS_RotationMatrix &m) {
00346         return EGS_Vector(v.x*m.rxx+v.y*m.ryx+v.z*m.rzx,
00347                           v.x*m.rxy+v.y*m.ryy+v.z*m.rzy,
00348                           v.x*m.rxz+v.y*m.ryz+v.z*m.rzz);
00349     };
00350 
00355     friend EGS_Vector &operator*=(EGS_Vector &v, const EGS_RotationMatrix &m) {
00356         v = v*m;
00357         return v;
00358     };
00359 
00360     inline EGS_Float xx() const {
00361         return rxx;
00362     };
00363     inline EGS_Float xy() const {
00364         return rxy;
00365     };
00366     inline EGS_Float xz() const {
00367         return rxz;
00368     };
00369     inline EGS_Float yx() const {
00370         return ryx;
00371     };
00372     inline EGS_Float yy() const {
00373         return ryy;
00374     };
00375     inline EGS_Float yz() const {
00376         return ryz;
00377     };
00378     inline EGS_Float zx() const {
00379         return rzx;
00380     };
00381     inline EGS_Float zy() const {
00382         return rzy;
00383     };
00384     inline EGS_Float zz() const {
00385         return rzz;
00386     };
00387 
00388 };

00400 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_AffineTransform {
00401 
00402 protected:
00403 
00404     EGS_RotationMatrix R;
00405     EGS_Vector         t;
00406     bool               has_t, has_R;
00407 
00408 public:
00409 
00411     EGS_AffineTransform() : R(),t(),has_t(false),has_R(false) {};
00412 
00414     EGS_AffineTransform(const EGS_AffineTransform &tr) :
00415         R(tr.R),t(tr.t),has_t(tr.has_t),has_R(tr.has_R) {};
00416 
00419     EGS_AffineTransform(const EGS_RotationMatrix &m, const EGS_Vector &v) :
00420         R(m),t(v) {
00421         if (t.length2() > 0) {
00422             has_t = true;
00423         }
00424         else {
00425             has_t = false;
00426         }
00427         if (R.isI()) {
00428             has_R = false;
00429         }
00430         else {
00431             has_R = true;
00432         }
00433     };
00434 
00437     EGS_AffineTransform(const EGS_RotationMatrix &m) : R(m),t() {
00438         has_t = false;
00439         if (R.isI()) {
00440             has_R = false;
00441         }
00442         else {
00443             has_R = true;
00444         }
00445     };
00446 
00449     EGS_AffineTransform(const EGS_Vector &v) : R(),t(v) {
00450         has_R = false;
00451         if (t.length2() > 0) {
00452             has_t = true;
00453         }
00454         else {
00455             has_t = false;
00456         }
00457     };
00458 
00468     EGS_AffineTransform operator*(const EGS_AffineTransform &tr) const {
00469         return EGS_AffineTransform(R*tr.R,R*tr.t+t);
00470     };
00471 
00475     EGS_AffineTransform operator*(const EGS_RotationMatrix &m) const {
00476         return EGS_AffineTransform(R*m,t);
00477     };
00478 
00484     EGS_AffineTransform &operator*=(const EGS_AffineTransform &tr) {
00485         return *this = operator * (tr);
00486     };
00487 
00493     EGS_AffineTransform &operator*=(const EGS_RotationMatrix &m) {
00494         return *this = operator * (m);
00495     };
00496 
00497     EGS_AffineTransform operator+(const EGS_Vector &v) const {
00498         return EGS_AffineTransform(R,t+v);
00499     };
00500 
00501     EGS_AffineTransform &operator+=(const EGS_Vector &v) {
00502         t += v;
00503         return *this;
00504     };
00505 
00509     EGS_Vector operator*(const EGS_Vector &v) const {
00510         return (R*v + t);
00511     };
00512 
00515     friend EGS_Vector operator*(const EGS_Vector &v,
00516                                 const EGS_AffineTransform &tr) {
00517         return ((v-tr.t)*tr.R);
00518     };
00519 
00522     friend EGS_Vector &operator*=(EGS_Vector &v,
00523                                   const EGS_AffineTransform &tr) {
00524         v = v*tr;
00525         return v;
00526     };
00527 
00529     void transform(EGS_Vector &v) const {
00530         if (has_R) {
00531             v = R*v;
00532         }
00533         if (has_t) {
00534             v += t;
00535         }
00536     };
00537 
00539     void inverseTransform(EGS_Vector &v) const {
00540         if (has_t) {
00541             v -= t;
00542         }
00543         if (has_R) {
00544             v *= R;
00545         }
00546         //v -= t; v *= R;
00547     };
00548 
00550     EGS_AffineTransform inverse() const {
00551         EGS_Vector tmp;
00552         tmp -= t*R;
00553         return EGS_AffineTransform(R.inverse(),tmp);
00554     };
00555 
00557     void rotate(EGS_Vector &v) const {
00558         if (has_R) {
00559             v = R*v;
00560         }
00561     };
00563     void rotateInverse(EGS_Vector &v) const {
00564         if (has_R) {
00565             v *= R;
00566         }
00567     };
00569     void translate(EGS_Vector &v) const {
00570         v += t;
00571     };
00572 
00575     const EGS_Vector &getTranslation() const {
00576         return t;
00577     };
00580     const EGS_RotationMatrix &getRotation() const {
00581         return R;
00582     };
00583 
00586     bool isI() const {
00587         return (!has_R && !has_t);
00588     };
00589 
00592     bool hasTranslation() const {
00593         return has_t;
00594     };
00595 
00598     bool hasRotation() const {
00599         return has_R;
00600     };
00601 
00636     static EGS_AffineTransform *getTransformation(EGS_Input *inp);
00637 
00638 };
